title: Super Detective in the Fictional World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Ability Steal   Aliens   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Based on a Movie   Comedic Undertone   Crime   Criminals   Detectives   Familial Love   Fanfiction   Fantasy World   Fast Learner   Firearms   Game Elements   Gangs   Gunfighters   Heroes   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Investigations   Level System   Low-key Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Movies   Mutated Creatures   Mutations   Mystery Solving   Police   Psychic Powers   Reincarnation   Secret Identity   S*x Friends   Special Abilities   Transmigration   Vampires   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Icy Plain's Three Elegance   冰原三雅
description:
Luke has transmigrated to the United States, but eventually realizes that this United States is different from the United States of his previous life. Here, the superpowers and characters from the movies in his previous life actually exist. How will Luke fare in a world where such terrifying superpowers exist?

Fortunately, he has a cheat – the Super Detective System.

Join Luke on his new journey toward becoming a detective.>
